body:
Wich pack do you guys use?
Share your best and favorite packs with the community! ;)

title: Share your texturepack with the community!

replies.body: I use the Moyen Pack by Loo: https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/bce216dd2
replies.body_tagged: I use the Moyen Pack by Loo: https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/bce216dd2

replies.body:
A variety. 

Let's just say I'm working on 3 packs right now and I pretty much think about them a lot when I doze off in school. i haven't worked on a pack so much for a long time xd.

replies.body:
:333 such a weird pack but has a special part in my heart (not even a rapper gg)

I'm coming up with 3 new packs:

A UHC/BuildUHC pack (default edit, ill have some 32x textures)

A Kohi Pack (Gapple/Pot/etc.) (will be 512x mostly)

A ocn.exe edit (as in DTM pack. It's basically the ocn.exe pack with a lot of edits and it's red instead of normal.)
